author: sussman
msg: The latest gzip bugs are causing a lot of problems for users.

author: jpieper
msg: Issue #1779: Finish this issue up by removing support for backpath
collapsing from svn_path_canonicalize and returning a user visible
error if URLs with '..' elements are passed on the command line.
(svn_opt_args_to_target_array): Return an error if a backpath ('..')
(svn_path_is_backpath_present): New function that determines if any
element of the given path is the '..' path.
(test_canonicalize): Fix the tests that expected backpaths to be
verifies that ".." cannot be in the middle of an externals
definition.  This is the same test that was removed in r10133.

author: oyvindmo
msg: - Translate some of the command help argument placeholder names
